text.text_translated: In the last 200 years, technology and health got better. Because fewer children died young, the number of people in the world grew very fast. These big families had more children. These children lived to become adults and had their own children. But in the 1960s, more people could get contraception. Contraception is medicine or things people use to stop having babies. So, the average number of babies for each woman went down. It went from six babies for each woman to two.

feedback.feedback: The provided feedback is excellent. It is direct, blunt, and concise. It clearly states the primary failure reason ('Meaning Preservation Failure'), provides specific, quantifiable evidence ('MeaningBERT score of 0.7385'), and contrasts the original and new phrasing to justify the failure. The suggestion for improvement is concrete and helpful. This is a perfect example of the required feedback style.
